channel.title: CVE Feed for Siretta -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Siretta -- all products

item.title: CVE-2022-38066|2024-07-31T20:11:32.558Z -- siretta -- quartz-gold
item.description: An OS command injection vulnerability exists in the httpd SNMP functionality of Siretta QUARTZ-GOLD G5.0.1.5-210720-141020. A specially-crafted HTTP response can lead to arbitrary command execution. An attacker can send a network request to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2022-40701|2024-07-31T20:11:56.186Z -- siretta -- quartz-gold
item.description: A directory traversal vulnerability exists in the httpd delfile.cgi functionality of Siretta QUARTZ-GOLD G5.0.1.5-210720-141020. A specially-crafted HTTP request can lead to arbitrary file deletion. An attacker can send an HTTP request to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2022-41154|2024-07-31T20:12:04.832Z -- siretta -- quartz-gold
item.description: A directory traversal vulnerability exists in the m2m DELETE_FILE cmd functionality of Siretta QUARTZ-GOLD G5.0.1.5-210720-141020. A specially-crafted network packet can lead to arbitrary file deletion. An attacker can send a network request to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2022-38088|2024-07-31T20:11:35.357Z -- siretta -- quartz-gold
item.description: A directory traversal vulnerability exists in the httpd downfile.cgi functionality of Siretta QUARTZ-GOLD G5.0.1.5-210720-141020. A specially-crafted HTTP request can lead to arbitrary file read. An attacker can send an HTTP request to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2022-38451|2024-07-31T20:11:38.257Z -- siretta -- quartz-gold
item.description: A directory traversal vulnerability exists in the httpd update.cgi functionality of FreshTomato 2022.5. A specially crafted HTTP request can lead to arbitrary file read. An attacker can send an HTTP request to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2022-40220|2024-07-31T20:11:49.481Z -- siretta -- quartz-gold
item.description: An OS command injection vulnerability exists in the httpd txt/restore.cgi functionality of Siretta QUARTZ-GOLD G5.0.1.5-210720-141020. A specially-crafted network request can lead to arbitrary command execution. An attacker can send an HTTP request to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2022-41991|2024-07-31T20:12:22.232Z -- siretta -- quartz-gold
item.description: A heap-based buffer overflow vulnerability exists in the m2m DELETE_FILE cmd functionality of Siretta QUARTZ-GOLD G5.0.1.5-210720-141020. A specially-crafted network request can lead to a heap buffer overflow. An attacker can send a network request to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2022-39045|2024-07-31T20:11:44.821Z -- siretta -- quartz-gold
item.description: A file write vulnerability exists in the httpd upload.cgi functionality of Siretta QUARTZ-GOLD G5.0.1.5-210720-141020. A specially-crafted HTTP request can lead to arbitrary file upload. An attacker can send an HTTP request to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2022-40222|2024-07-31T20:11:50.453Z -- siretta -- quartz-gold
item.description: An OS command injection vulnerability exists in the m2m DELETE_FILE cmd functionality of Siretta QUARTZ-GOLD G5.0.1.5-210720-141020. A specially-crafted network request can lead to arbitrary command execution. An attacker can send a network request to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2022-38715|2024-07-31T20:11:42.990Z -- siretta -- quartz-gold
item.description: A leftover debug code vulnerability exists in the httpd shell.cgi functionality of Siretta QUARTZ-GOLD G5.0.1.5-210720-141020. A specially-crafted HTTP request can lead to remote code execution. An attacker can send an HTTP request to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2022-40969|2024-07-31T20:12:00.809Z -- siretta -- quartz-gold
item.description: An os command injection vulnerability exists in the httpd delfile.cgi functionality of Siretta QUARTZ-GOLD G5.0.1.5-210720-141020. A specially-crafted HTTP request can lead to arbitrary command execution. An attacker can send an HTTP request to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2022-36279|2024-07-31T20:11:23.499Z -- siretta -- quartz-gold
item.description: A stack-based buffer overflow vulnerability exists in the httpd delfile.cgi functionality of Siretta QUARTZ-GOLD G5.0.1.5-210720-141020. A specially-crafted HTTP request can lead to remote code execution. An attacker can send an HTTP request to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2022-38459|2024-07-31T20:11:41.167Z -- siretta -- quartz-gold
item.description: A stack-based buffer overflow vulnerability exists in the httpd downfile.cgi functionality of Siretta QUARTZ-GOLD G5.0.1.5-210720-141020. A specially-crafted HTTP request can lead to remote code execution. An attacker can send an HTTP request to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2022-42484|2024-07-31T20:12:27.723Z -- siretta -- quartz-gold
item.description: An OS command injection vulnerability exists in the httpd logs/view.cgi functionality of FreshTomato 2022.5. A specially crafted HTTP request can lead to arbitrary command execution. An attacker can send an HTTP request to trigger this vulnerability.
